about_the_game:
There's no business like magic business. Time to set up shop in an idyllic small town in a medieval land filled with fairy tale magic, Discworld-esque comedy, and pop-fantasy cliches. Start small, and grow your business as your fame reaches new customers. If you think running a store is easy and somewhat dull - think again! This is no mundane supermarket. This is an establishment of miracles and wonder! Fill your shelves with magical merchandise and adjust the prices for optimal profit, while making sure your quirky clientele can still afford it. Expand your shop, add shelves, and organize your wares to attract customers!


The alchemy workshop above your store is where the real magic happens, and where you can make the most profit. Master the alchemical arts and brew potions worth their weight in gold. Fill your grimoire with formulas for useful concoctions through research and experimentation. Each ingredient has its unique properties - mash them in the mortar, mix with water and spirits, boil them in your cauldron while stirring carefully. Your elixirs will make a good coin when sold in your shop, but there's even more money to be made on custom orders. Sometimes, a customer will come with a problem only an alchemist can solve!


Good alchemical ingredients aren't that hard to come by or as expensive as one might think, while bought in bulk from the vendor across the street. But they're even cheaper if you grow them yourself! Fill your backyard with plants and mushrooms that hold all sorts of arcane qualities - from relieving bad gas to unraveling the fabric of reality. Make sure to always keep some extra planters of all sizes if you come by a rare seed while browsing your suppliers wares. Do you have a green thumb? Just remember to water your crops - they're the key to your future fortune!


As you gain wealth and experience, you will unlock new skills, options, and access to some more extravagant wares delivered to you from the farthest reaches of the realm through a network of travelling merchants. Some of the items will blow your mind (no, really - handle the Fire Wands with extreme care!). You'll also be able to buy some extra furnishing for your establishment, rare ingredients for your potions, and seeds to get your garden going. Keep an eye on lucrative wares, buy low, sell high and make sure to delight your clientele!

name: Alchemist Shop Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel: Core i5-4670 / Core i3-8100 | AMD: FX-8150 / Ryzen 3 1300X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: "Nvidia: GeForce GTX 660 2GB / GeForce GTX 1050 2GB | AMD: Radeon R7 265 2GB / Radeon RX 460 2GB"
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: "Intel: Core i3-14100 | AMD: Ryzen 5 5500"
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: "Nvidia: RTX 3050 4GB | AMD: Radeon RX 6500XT 4GB"
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Run your own magic business! In Alchemist Shop Simulator you can trade magical wares, brew potions and take on special orders, meet many quirky clients, grow your ingredients in your garden, restock your shelves and manage prices. Keep expanding your business as you gain experience and wealth!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Turkish, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Dutch, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
